parts.name: statement
parts.prose: When transferring information between different security domains, sanitize data to minimize {{ ac-4.25_prm_1 }} in accordance with {{ ac-4.25_prm_2 }}].

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Data sanitization is the process of irreversibly removing or destroying data stored on a memory device (e.g., hard drives, flash memory/solid state drives, mobile devices, CDs, and DVDs) or in hard copy form.
